```{r}
# Necessary packages 
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(vroom)
library(here)
library (knitr)

here::i_am("eval-grades.Rproj")
```


## Introduction

### Study organization 

#### Question 1

```{r}
courses <- vroom(
  here("data", "courses.csv"))
```
##### Question 2

```{r}
courses |>
  rename(
  `course name` = course,
  identifier = course_id,
  `number of grades` = nb_grades
) |>
  arrange(`course name`) |>
  kable()
```
